hero.heading: Stay ahead of competitors with automated leads generation
hero.text: Streamline and automate extensive lead research with intelligent agents. Get valuable insights and rich information on potential prospects for effective decision-making.

demo.heading: Enrich data with AI powered agents
demo.text: If you're unable to find the specific dataset you're looking for, simply submit a request to our team with your email, and we'll get in touch with you.

features_1.heading: Unlock a new level of prospecting with AI agents
features_1.text: Score leads and easily identify accounts worth prioritizing instead of manual research and vetting which takes days. Stay up to date with real-time monitoring for timely engagements.
features_list: Research leads in seconds not days
Rich data for more effective outreaches

features_2.kicker: Focus your efforts on potential high value leads
features_2.heading: Get rich data for rich impact
features_2.text: Explore an array of AI-ready datasets to get started with. Test the functionalities of our platform with public datasets, enabling seamless experimentation for your AI projects.

hero.heading: Simplify product insights for better sales performance
hero.text: Enhance your product management workflow using intelligent agents. Automate data gathering and analytics, transforming your operations with actionable insights.

demo.heading: Streamline Data Collection
demo.text: Our web crawling agents extract pricing, reviews, specs, and more from various websites, saving time and effort on manual research.

features_1.heading: Generate Comprehensive Analytics
features_1.text: Our reporting agents analyze sales trends, customer sentiment, vendor performance, and more over custom time periods, providing insights in moments that would take hours manually.

features_2.kicker: Focus your efforts on potential high value leads
features_2.heading: Get rich data for rich impact
features_2.text: Leverage our spreadsheet analysis agents to mine product data like inventory, costs, and margins, enabling detailed analysis and optimization opportunities.

hero.heading: Revolutionize Your Recruiting Process with AI Agents
hero.text: Enhance your recruitment workflow with intelligent agents. Automate candidate sourcing, research, and communication to optimize your hiring processes.

demo.heading: Discover the best talent effortlessly
demo.text: Our sourcing agents quickly identify and extract candidate info from platforms like LinkedIn based on skills, titles, and keywords, eliminating manual searching and documentation.

features_1.heading: Get detailed insights on candidates
features_1.text: Our agents source data from disparate sources to provide comprehensive insights on companies, roles, culture, and more during a candidate's tenure, saving recruiters hours of background investigation per prospect.

features_2.text: Explore an array of AI-ready datasets to get started with. Test the functionalities of our platform with public datasets, enabling seamless experimentation for your AI projects.
